title: Hello there, I want to buy a pixel device. I want to know is there any service center in Odisha?
content: I have heard so much praise about pixel's cameras. I am currently planning to buy a pixel device. I am ready to ignore sub-par specs at the price for so hyped google camera. Only Service centre is uncompromising aspect for me. I couldn't find address of any service center in Odisha. I want to know if there is any service center in Odisha.
